ModMetaData.name: Shenrigine human
ModMetaData.author: LightVyuri
ModMetaData.description:
Version:0.7.0

Adds a humanlike race called Shenrigine human and the technologies of Shenrigine Civilization.
Shenrigine human live in a pannet which is almost as same as our Earth.They are all female and looks as same as human women but they are 20 times mechanically stronger than ordinary human. Their Shenrigine civilization has reached the spacer age and some of them comes to the rimworld...

Thanks for Gloomylynx's hairstyle mod GloomyHair. I will upload it only in Steam Workshop. If this mod is alleged to be infringing, I would remove it.
